name: Health reminder
description: This was my graduation project. The project is a React Native app that reminds the users to drink water. It has a simple UI made with nativewind and a reminder system. The app also has a feature to track the user's water intake. The app is designed to be user-friendly and easy to use. The project also uses an appwrite database through which the users authenticate and store their information.

name: Todo list
description: This was the first app I made in React Native. I made to fifamiliarize myself with the way you make apps in this framework. The app serves as a simple todo tracker. It uses an appwrite database to store users and their info. Styling for this app was made with nativewind.
